name: Nyanco Space
description:
It was a beautiful Sunday afternoon and Nyanco was happily taking a stroll. All was well. Until aliens suddenly appeared and abducted Nyanco! You and her were scheduled to waltz together, but she's been taken away! Can you save Nyanco? Your adventure to save her begins!

Various Adventures

6 Worlds, 48 Stages, Boss Battles, SF Fantasy, Christmas, Halloween, Space, and More!

Features

  • Old School Arcade Game Experience
  • Simple Yet Addictive Casual Gameplay
  • Recommended For Nyanco Channel Fans
  • Special rewards include illustrations of Nyanco

Game Engine

RPG Maker VX Ace

Disclaimer

Nyanco Space is fictional. Any resemblance to the real world is purely coincidental.

Special Thanks

Alice, nashix, Holy Lightning, HaZE, ParanoX, and You!
